name: The Legend of the Endless Summer
name_original: The Legend of the Endless Summer
description:
This was for the 2nd SodorJam of 2022! The objective was to make a Zelda clone. I based my entry off of The Legend of Zelda: Oracle of Seasons!

Controls:

Movement: WASD or Arrow Keys

Confirm: Enter

Programs Used: 

Art - Aseprite

Game Engine - RPG Maker 2003

Music - Famitracker / Milkytracker

Credits: 

Sodor - Art, Music, Gamedev

Somepx - Text Fonts

Extra Credits:

Special thanks to the RPG Maker community! Without their helpful tips and tutorials, this game would not be possible!

Special thanks to my community members on Twitch and Discord for the support and for participating in this Game Jam!

Special thanks to YOU for checking out my work!
